name: Table Tales 1.0
description:
Table Tales is a 2D casual RPG where players interact with in-game characters to learn more about the world and unlock new areas to explore. In a light hearted world, you open a restaurant to experiment with different foods and see what this area of the world has to offer. During the day, you wander through various biomes to gather ingredients and later return to your restaurant to prepare a meal tailored to people you find interesting. *As you prove yourself a loyal friend through understanding your customers, they open up to you and share tips about parts of the world with which they are most familiar.
